intro_it: Il progetto nasce nell’ambito dell’iniziativa nazionale CHANGES (Spoke 4), con l’obiettivo di promuovere la digitalizzazione strutturata del patrimonio culturale a vocazione scientifica. Il caso studio dedicato a Ulisse Aldrovandi integra tecnologie 3D, metadatazione avanzata e strategie di comunicazione digitale per costruire modelli replicabili di digital twin culturali. La piattaforma è pensata per ricercatori, curatori, studenti e istituzioni culturali interessate a strumenti di consultazione, analisi e narrazione dei dati.
intro_en: The project was born within the framework of the national CHANGES initiative (Spoke 4), with the aim of promoting the structured digitization of cultural heritage with a scientific vocation. The case study dedicated to Ulisse Aldrovandi integrates 3D technologies, advanced metadata and digital communication strategies to build replicable models of cultural digital twins. The platform is designed for researchers, curators, students and cultural institutions interested in tools for data consultation, analysis and storytelling.

actions.title_en: Collection and organization of cultural data

items_en: Acquisition and modelling of 3D objects and environments

items_it: Conversione e armonizzazione dei metadati secondo standard europei
Validazione e arricchimento semantico dei dati
items_en: Convergence and harmonization of metadata according to European standards
Validation and semantic enrichment of data

items_it: Sviluppo software e interfacce per l’accesso
Integrazione con dati e metadati in tempo reale
items_en: Software and interface development for access
Integration with real-time data and metadata

items_it: Strategie di comunicazione e storytelling digitale
Creazione di datastorie e piattaforme open access
Coinvolgimento di università, musei, scuole e ricercatori
items_en: Creation of data stories and open access platforms
Engagement of universities, museums, schools and researchers

filters.query: PREFIX crm: <http://www.cidoc-crm.org/cidoc-crm/> PREFIX lrmoo: <http://iflastandards.info/ns/lrm/lrmoo/> SELECT DISTINCT ?label ?uri WHERE { ?item a lrmoo:F5_Item . ?manifestation lrmoo:R7i_is_exemplified_by ?item . ?expression lrmoo:R4i_is_embodied_in ?manifestation . ?work lrmoo:R3_is_realised_in ?expression . ?expression crm:P129_is_about ?uri . ?uri crm:P1_is_identified_by ?uri_appellation . ?uri_appellation crm:P190_has_symbolic_content ?label .} ORDER BY ?label

PREFIX crm: <http://www.cidoc-crm.org/cidoc-crm/> PREFIX lrmoo: <http://iflastandards.info/ns/lrm/lrmoo/> PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> SELECT DISTINCT ?label ?uri WHERE { ?item a lrmoo:F5_Item . ?manifestation lrmoo:R7i_is_exemplified_by ?item ; crm:P2_has_type ?uri .  ?uri rdfs:label ?label . FILTER( lang(?label) = "$LANG$")} ORDER BY ?label

PREFIX crm: <http://www.cidoc-crm.org/cidoc-crm/> PREFIX lrmoo: <http://iflastandards.info/ns/lrm/lrmoo/> PREFIX aat: <http://vocab.getty.edu/page/aat/> SELECT DISTINCT ?label ?uri WHERE {?item a lrmoo:F5_Item . ?manifestation lrmoo:R7i_is_exemplified_by ?item .  ?expression lrmoo:R4i_is_embodied_in ?manifestation . ?work lrmoo:R3_is_realised_in ?expression . ?activity crm:P16_used_specific_object ?item ; a crm:E7_Activity ; crm:P14_carried_out_by ?uri . BIND(REPLACE(REPLACE(STRAFTER(STR(?uri), "/acr/"), "/\\d+$", ""), "_", " ") AS ?label)}

cards.where: ?item a lrmoo:F5_Item . ?manifestation lrmoo:R7i_is_exemplified_by ?item . ?expression lrmoo:R4i_is_embodied_in ?manifestation . ?work lrmoo:R3_is_realised_in ?expression . ?work crm:P102_has_title ?title_uri . ?title_uri crm:P190_has_symbolic_content ?title. FILTER( lang(?title) = "$LANG$")

it: Oltre 200 oggetti schedati, digitalizzati e in parte modellati in 3D costituiscono una base solida per l’interrogazione semantica e la costruzione di nuove narrazioni scientifico-culturali.
en: Over 200 objects catalogued, digitised and partly modelled in 3D form a solid basis for semantic querying and the construction of new scientific and cultural narratives.

visualizations.sparql_query: PREFIX crm: <http://www.cidoc-crm.org/cidoc-crm/> PREFIX lrmoo: <http://iflastandards.info/ns/lrm/lrmoo/> PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> SELECT ?type_label (COUNT(DISTINCT ?item) AS ?count) WHERE { ?item a lrmoo:F5_Item . ?manifestation lrmoo:R7i_is_exemplified_by ?item ; crm:P2_has_type ?type_uri .  ?type_uri rdfs:label ?type_label . FILTER( lang(?type_label) = "$LANG$")} GROUP BY ?type_label

PREFIX crm: <http://www.cidoc-crm.org/cidoc-crm/> PREFIX lrmoo: <http://iflastandards.info/ns/lrm/lrmoo/> SELECT ?item ?begin ?end WHERE {?item a lrmoo:F5_Item . ?manifestation lrmoo:R7i_is_exemplified_by ?item . ?expression lrmoo:R4i_is_embodied_in ?manifestation . ?creation a lrmoo:F28_Expression_Creation ; lrmoo:R17_created ?expression ; crm:P4_has_time-span ?timespan . ?timespan crm:P82a_begin_of_the_begin ?begin ; crm:P82b_end_of_the_end ?end . }
